body_html:
Maybe under common problems? https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup#common_problems

Not 100% sure what those flags do. IE, it worked for bazel build, but not for bazel test, it fails with error which suggests env problems (work-around is to do bazel test sometes followed by bazel-bin/.../sometest)

Not 100% sure what those flags do. IE, it worked for bazel build, but not for bazel test, it fails with error which suggests env problems (work-around is to do bazel test sometes followed by bazel-bin/.../sometest)
body:
Maybe under common problems? https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup#common_problems

Not 100% sure what those flags do. IE, it worked for `bazel build`, but not for `bazel test`, it fails with error which suggests env problems (work-around is to do `bazel test sometes` followed by `bazel-bin/.../sometest`)
